mapper.insert: insert into admin_user (username, password, enabled) values (#{username}, #{password}, #{enabled});
insert into user_profile (user_id, email, sex, qq, city) values (#{userId}, #{email}, #{sex}, #{qq}, #{city});
mapper.select: select u.id, u.username, u.enabled, u.last_login_time, u.last_login_ip, p.email, p.sex, p.qq, p.city, uw.weight from admin_user u left join user_profile p on p.user_id = u.id left join (select u.id user_id, max(IFNULL(r.weight, 0)) weight from admin_user u left join admin_user__role ur on u.id = ur.user_id left join admin_role r on r.id = ur.role_id group by u.id ) uw on uw.user_id = u.id where u.id = #{userId}
select exists(select 1 from admin_user where id=#{userId})

select u.id, u.username, u.password, u.last_login_time, u.last_login_ip, u.enabled, t.thread_num, p.post_num from admin_user u left join (select u.id user_id, max(IFNULL(r.weight, 0)) weight from admin_user u left join admin_user__role ur on u.id = ur.user_id left join admin_role r on r.id = ur.role_id group by u.id ) uw on uw.user_id = u.id left join (select user_id, count(*) thread_num from thread group by user_id) t on t.user_id = u.id left join (select user_id, count(*) post_num from post group by user_id) p on p.user_id = u.id where (uw.weight < #{weight} or uw.weight is null )
and u.username like #{searchLike}

select r.id, r.description, r.enabled , ur.id selected from admin_role r
left join admin_user__role ur on ur.user_id = #{userId} and ur.role_id = r.id
where r.weight < #{weight} order by r.weight asc

select c.id, c.name, c.status , uc.id selected from category c
left join user_category uc on uc.user_id = #{userId} and uc.category_id = c.id
